    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Powered Full Plate](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1982)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 64 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Stasian actuators help the limbs of this [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13) move of their own accord, as long as they're supplied with power. A chamber in the chest plate can hold a single [bottled lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), which takes 3 Interact actions to install. A loaded suit of powered full plate can be activated to lower the armor's Strength requirement by 1 plus the item bonus of the loaded bomb. The armor's normal penalties still apply, based on this altered Strength. However, add the bottled lightning's item bonus to your [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34), [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36), [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37), and [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38). These effects last for 10 minutes. The armor uses up the bottled lightning during the duration and can't be activated again until a new one is installed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
